definition: someone whose employment involves carrying something
details:
noun
- someone whose employment involves carrying something
= synonyms: carrier
- the person who is in possession of a check or note or bond or document of title that is endorsed to him or to whoever holds it
= example: the person who is in possession of a check or note or bond or document of title that is endorsed to him or to whoever holds it
= synonyms: holder
- a messenger who bears or presents
= example: a messenger who bears or presents
- one of the mourners carrying the coffin at a funeral
= synonyms: pallbearer
